Honestly to me this whole story is kinda messed up pretty much non-blood related siblings love each other. Especially the girl here loves the brother and is really pushing for them to get together on the side is childhood friend who is crazy in love with the girl. The girls brain is just empty, pretty much asks the friend for advice and she makes a little progress thanks to it and he manages to convince her to sleep with him over and over till she's gotten addicted to him. At the same time even when she doesn't need to anymore he manages to convince her to let him creampie all the time and before she has sex with the guy she loves. So of course the baby is gonna be his. The brother even catches them once and doesn't do anything just walks away and then let's it all  continue while the dumb sis is oh so happy cause everything the friend tells her makes her closer and eventually marry the one she loves. Then the dude get's crushed by a what? 3-5 year old kid? Like wtf dude...
